source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video features a slow pan across a dimly lit, wood-paneled attic. Red string lights are strung across the ceiling, casting a reddish glow on the scene. A black and white photograph of two hands hangs from a line, and a chair covered in a white sheet is visible.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video features a slow pan across a dimly lit, wood-paneled attic. Red string lights are strung across the ceiling, casting a reddish glow on the scene. A black and white photograph of two hands hangs from a line, and a chair covered in a white sheet is visible.

generated_critique: The video shows a cat jumping onto a table in the attic.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video features a slow pan across a dimly lit, wood-paneled attic. Red string lights are strung across the ceiling, casting a reddish glow on the scene. A black and white photograph of two hands hangs from a line, and a chair covered in a white sheet is visible. A cat jumps onto a table, adding a lively touch to the mysterious atmosphere.
